sdkDatabase.title: Database API
sdkDatabase.subtitle: Complete reference for SQLite database operations in your extension.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: The Database API provides full SQLite access with automatic table namespacing, migrations, and optional Drizzle ORM integration.

queryMethods.title: Query Methods
queryMethods.note: Always use parameterized queries (?) to prevent SQL injection.

helperMethods.title: Helper Methods
helperMethods.intro: These convenience methods simplify common operations:

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.warning: If any statement fails, all changes are rolled back.

migrations.title: Migrations
migrations.intro: Register and run database migrations. Migrations are tracked and only run once:
